name: qiankun
description: 以qiankun为微服务架构的项目，展示学习内容和组件

scripts.install:npm: cd main && npm install && cd ../sub-vue2 && npm install && cd ../sub-vue3 && npm install && cd ../sub-react && npm install
scripts.install:pnpm: cd main && pnpm install && cd ../sub-vue2 && pnpm install && cd ../sub-vue3 && pnpm install && cd ../sub-react && pnpm install
